abstract: Laurence D. Fink, chief executive of the alternative investment manager BlackRock, sees some big opportunities for his firm in the new post-credit-meltdown Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: Laurence D. Fink, chief executive of the alternative investment manager BlackRock, sees some big opportunities for his firm in the new post-credit-meltdown Wall Street.

headline.main: BlackRock Sees Opportunity Despite Market Turmoil

abstract: The appointment of Richard D. Parsons, the former Time Warner chairman, comes after pressure from regulators.
snippet: The appointment of Richard D. Parsons, the former Time Warner chairman, comes after pressure from regulators.
lead_paragraph: Responding to pressure from federal bank regulators, Citigroup on Wednesday named Richard D. Parsons, the former chairman of Time Warner, as its next chairman.

headline.print_headline: Parsons of Time Warner Named Citi Chairman

abstract: Responding to pressure from federal bank regulators, Citigroup on Wednesday named Richard D. Parsons, the former chairman of Time Warner, to be its next chairman.
lead_paragraph: Responding to pressure from federal bank regulators, Citigroup on Wednesday named Richard D. Parsons, the former chairman of Time Warner, to be its next chairman.

headline.main: Parsons of Time Warner Named Citi Chairman
